name: migy
description: Tiny migration tool for databases migrations

scripts.test: npm run build && docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up --force-recreate
scripts.test:sqlite: npm run build -- --dev && export MODULE=sqlite && docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up --abort-on-container-exit test
scripts.test:mysql: npm run build -- --dev && export MODULE=mysql && docker-compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up --abort-on-container-exit  test mysql

author: Alexey Schebelev
